About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hey, I'm Shimaa Sayed ;) Front-End developer living in cairo, Egypt
I've always been drawn to the overlap between design and development.
My passion is creating, and I find happiness in being a better me today than the me yesterday.

Development

Developed fully functional responsive prototypes based on Business Requirements using o HTML/HTML5,CSS3 ,SASS, Bootstrap o JavaScript, JQuery o Angular4 ,Angular6.

Design

As a Front-end developer, I believe it is important to understand both design and development to achieve a successful user-facing product. I can assist with producing clean and functional design where required. Having somebody on your team with knowledge of both disciplines can improve team communication.
